articles.description: Lava has confirmed that the Blaze 1X 5G will be available for purchase in India with 6GB of RAM and 128GB of internal storage.

articles.title: Moon mystery: China, Japan scientists have no answers for mysterious space gear disappearances - Fox News
articles.description: Chinese engineers believe that dust has piled up on the hibernating rover and prevented it from charging is batteries, but they cannot verify any of the information.
articles.content:
China and Japan have addressed mysterious circumstances around disappearing space equipment, including a lunar lander that would have completed Japans potential first successful moon landing.
